metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Persona 5 - Life Will Change has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Chord-Bass Melody and below-average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord Progression Novelty.
key_conclusion: Persona 5 - Life Will Change has sections analyzed in the following keys: F Phrygian,  and F Dorian.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
